traits.locale_text: Вы сопровождали десятину псайкеров на Черный корабль, ужасы варпа навсегда травмировали вашу душу и отвратили вас от запретных знаний

languages.text: Вы сопровождали десятину псайкеров на Черный корабль. Ужасы варпа навсегда травмировали вам душу и отвратили вас от запретных знаний.
You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
languages.original_text: Вы сопровождали десятину псайкеров на Черный корабль. Ужасы варпа навсегда травмировали вам душу и отвратили вас от запретных знаний.

traits.locale_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers on board a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
You escorted a tithe of psykers on board a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.
You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

languages.text: Du hast einen Zehnt von Psionikern auf einem Schwarzen Schiff eskortiert. Die Schrecken des Warp haben deine Seele gequält und halten dich davon ab, jemals verbotenes Wissen anzuzapfen.
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Du hast einen Zehnt von Psionikern auf einem Schwarzen Schiff eskortiert. Die Schrecken des Warp haben deine Seele gequält und halten dich davon ab, jemals verbotenes Wissen anzuzapfen.

languages.text: Vous avez escorté des psykers servant de paiement de la dîme à bord d'un Vaisseau Noir. Les terreurs du Warp ont tant ébranlé votre âme que cette expérience vous a {mf|dissuadé|dissuadée} d'avoir un jour recours aux connaissances interdites.
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez escorté des psykers servant de paiement de la dîme à bord d'un Vaisseau Noir. Les terreurs du Warp ont tant ébranlé votre âme que cette expérience vous a {mf|dissuadé|dissuadée} d'avoir un jour recours aux connaissances interdites.

languages.text: 你曾在黑船上护送一群通过什一税征收来的灵能者。亚空间的恐怖之物让你的灵魂饱受折磨，你再也不敢接触那些禁忌的知识。
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: 你曾在黑船上护送一群通过什一税征收来的灵能者。亚空间的恐怖之物让你的灵魂饱受折磨，你再也不敢接触那些禁忌的知识。

languages.text: Escoltaste a un diezmo de psíquicos a bordo de una Nave Negra. Los horrores de la disformidad atormentaron tu alma y te enseñaron a alejarte de los conocimientos prohibidos.
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Escoltaste a un diezmo de psíquicos a bordo de una Nave Negra. Los horrores de la disformidad atormentaron tu alma y te enseñaron a alejarte de los conocimientos prohibidos.

languages.text: あなたは異能者の租税を〈黒き御船〉へ護送した。〈歪み〉の恐怖はあなたの魂を深く苦しめ、禁断の知識に手を伸ばす気力を永遠に失わせた。
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: あなたは異能者の租税を〈黒き御船〉へ護送した。〈歪み〉の恐怖はあなたの魂を深く苦しめ、禁断の知識に手を伸ばす気力を永遠に失わせた。

languages.text: Kara Gemilerden birinde bir ruhsezer kafilesine eşlik ettin. Öteboyutun dehşetleri ruhunda derin yaralar açarak seni ömrün boyunca yasaklı irfandan uzak durmaya itti.
languages.original_text: You escorted a tithe of psykers aboard a Black Ship. The terrors of the warp left your soul harrowed, deterring you from ever tapping into forbidden knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Kara Gemilerden birinde bir ruhsezer kafilesine eşlik ettin. Öteboyutun dehşetleri ruhunda derin yaralar açarak seni ömrün boyunca yasaklı irfandan uzak durmaya itti.
